snippet: The significance of the 6.6 percent drop in exports and 11.3 decline in imports was unclear, because traders have been timing shipments to profit from currency market shifts.
abstract: China's exports unexpectedly fell in March and its imports dropped even more sharply; significance of data for country's economy is clouded by uncertainty over extent to which exporters and importers were timing shipments to profit from currency market shifts.
lead_paragraph: The significance of the 6.6 percent drop in exports and 11.3 decline in imports was unclear, because traders have been timing shipments to profit from currency market shifts.

headline.main: Chinese Exports and Imports Unexpectedly Fell in March
headline.print_headline: China Sees Unexpected Drop in Its Exports and Imports
